◆ PKSAV_GEN1_CURRENT_POKEMON_BOX_NUM_MASK

#define PKSAV_GEN1_CURRENT_POKEMON_BOX_NUM_MASK   ((uint8_t)0x0F)

Mask for getting the current Pokémon box number.

In the field for storing the current Pokémon box number, the relevant value is only stored in the lower four bytes.

This is used with the pksav_gen1_save_t.current_box_num field.
